events.name: Nancy Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
events.wd_description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.
events.description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi visited Taiwan, marking the most senior US politician visit in 25 years, prompting strong reactions from China.

events.name: Pelosi's visit
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi, the most senior US politician to visit Taiwan in 25 years, met with leaders in Taipei's capital.

events.name: Chinese government's response
events.wd_description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.
events.description: The Chinese government accused the United States of violating China’s sovereignty under the guise of democracy, with Foreign Minister Wang Yi issuing a warning.

events.name: Pelosi's statement
events.wd_description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.
events.description: Nancy Pelosi stated that China cannot prevent world leaders from traveling to Taiwan to respect its democracy, highlight its successes, and reaffirm commitment to collaboration.

events.name: Biden's disapproval
events.wd_description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.
events.description: President Joe Biden, Pelosi's party colleague, did not approve of her visit, stating that the American military felt it was "not a good idea right now" due to high tensions with China.

events.name: Damage to Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant
events.wd_label: Damage to Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant
events.wd_description: The Ukrainian nuclear agency reported that part of the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, controlled by Russia, was damaged by Russian rockets, though no radiation leak is suspected.
events.description: The Ukrainian nuclear agency reported that part of the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, controlled by Russia, was damaged by Russian rockets, though no radiation leak is suspected.

events.name: Enerhoatom report
events.wd_description: Enerhoatom reported that a nitrogen-oxygen unit and a high-voltage power line at the Zaporizhzhia plant were damaged by Russian rockets.
events.description: Enerhoatom reported that a nitrogen-oxygen unit and a high-voltage power line at the Zaporizhzhia plant were damaged by Russian rockets.

events.name: Russian and Ukrainian blame
events.wd_description: Russian-appointed local officials blamed Ukraine for shelling, while Ukraine blamed Russian forces for launching rockets at civilian areas from the plant site.
events.description: Russian-appointed local officials blamed Ukraine for shelling, while Ukraine blamed Russian forces for launching rockets at civilian areas from the plant site.

events.name: plant control and operations
events.wd_description: Russia seized the Zaporizhzhia plant in March but kept Ukrainian employees to continue operations; the plant consists of six pressurized water reactors and stores radioactive waste.
events.description: Russia seized the Zaporizhzhia plant in March but kept Ukrainian employees to continue operations; the plant consists of six pressurized water reactors and stores radioactive waste.

events.name: UK defense ministry statement
events.wd_description: The UK's defense ministry stated that Russia has used the area around the Zaporizhzhia plant to minimize the risk of attack by Ukrainian forces due to its protected status.
events.description: The UK's defense ministry stated that Russia has used the area around the Zaporizhzhia plant to minimize the risk of attack by Ukrainian forces due to its protected status.

events.name: South Korea issues arrest warrant for Do Kwon
events.wd_label: South Korea issues arrest warrant for Do Kwon
events.wd_description: A South Korean court issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon, the primary developer of cryptocurrencies Luna and TerraUSD, whose collapse in May affected the global crypto market.
events.description: A South Korean court issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon, the primary developer of cryptocurrencies Luna and TerraUSD, whose collapse in May affected the global crypto market.

events.name: arrest warrant issuance
events.wd_description: The South Korean court issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon and five other individuals related to the collapse of Luna and TerraUSD.
events.description: The South Korean court issued an arrest warrant for Do Kwon and five other individuals related to the collapse of Luna and TerraUSD.

events.name: accusations against Kwon
events.wd_description: Investors accused Do Kwon of fraud following the collapse of Luna and TerraUSD in May.
events.description: Investors accused Do Kwon of fraud following the collapse of Luna and TerraUSD in May.

events.name: investigation details
events.wd_description: The arrest warrant came after months of investigation, including search and seizure operations at related offices and local cryptocurrency exchanges.
events.description: The arrest warrant came after months of investigation, including search and seizure operations at related offices and local cryptocurrency exchanges.

events.name: market impact
events.wd_description: The collapse of Luna and TerraUSD led to significant losses for investors, amounting to over $42 billion, and contributed to the failure of several major crypto companies.
events.description: The collapse of Luna and TerraUSD led to significant losses for investors, amounting to over $42 billion, and contributed to the failure of several major crypto companies.

events.name: FlexGen's role in the battery storage and energy grid integration
events.wd_label: FlexGen's role in the battery storage and energy grid integration
events.wd_description: FlexGen, a battery storage startup, integrates batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, supported by significant funding to expand its capabilities.
events.description: FlexGen, a battery storage startup, integrates batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, supported by significant funding to expand its capabilities.

events.name: funding raised
events.wd_description: FlexGen raised $100 million from investors, including the Dutch energy company Vitol, to support its battery storage and integration initiatives.
events.description: FlexGen raised $100 million from investors, including the Dutch energy company Vitol, to support its battery storage and integration initiatives.

events.name: integration and optimization
events.wd_description: FlexGen helps integrate batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, addressing the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources.
events.description: FlexGen helps integrate batteries into the traditional power grid and develops software to optimize their use, addressing the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources.

events.name: customer base
events.wd_description: FlexGen's customers include North Carolina's Electric Cooperatives and Southern California Edison, who rely on its technology for energy storage solutions.
events.description: FlexGen's customers include North Carolina's Electric Cooperatives and Southern California Edison, who rely on its technology for energy storage solutions.

events.name: future plans
events.wd_description: FlexGen plans to open a new innovation and research center in Durham to showcase emerging battery technologies and expand its capabilities.
events.description: FlexGen plans to open a new innovation and research center in Durham to showcase emerging battery technologies and expand its capabilities.
